short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings the joyful energy of the One Piece crew right to your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring vibrant colors and the beloved characters Luffy, Chopper, Nami, and Robin in a festive Japanese-inspired scene, this theme will light up your new tab page with excitement and fun. Perfect for fans of the epic adventure series, this extension captures the spirit of adventure, friendship, and celebration, providing a cheerful atmosphere every time you open a new tab.

Key features:
- Beautiful One  background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
